mapper.select: SELECT P.TITLE AS TITLE , TO_CHAR(P.CLOSING_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CLOSING_TIME , TO_CHAR(P.WORK_START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WORK_START_TIME , TO_CHAR(P.WORK_END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WORK_END_TIME , L.NAME AS LOCATION_NAME , C.NAME AS COMPANY_NAME , C.ID AS C_ID , P.ID AS P_ID , P.HEADCOUNT AS HEADCOUNT , P.HOURLY_WAGE AS HOURLY_WAGE FROM POSTING_APPLICATION PA, POSTING P, LOCATION L, POSTER_COMPANY_INFO PCI, COMPANY C WHERE PA.POSTING_ID = P.ID AND C.LOCATION_ID = L.ID AND P.P_COMPANY_INFO_ID = PCI.ID AND PCI.C_ID = C.ID AND PA.S_ID = #{s_id}

SELECT POR.ID AS POR_ID, P.TITLE AS TITLE , TO_CHAR(P.CLOSING_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CLOSING_TIME , TO_CHAR(P.WORK_START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WORK_START_TIME , TO_CHAR(P.WORK_END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WORK_END_TIME , L.NAME AS LOCATION_NAME , POS.STATE AS STATE , POR.STATUS_ID AS STATUS_ID , C.NAME AS COMPANY_NAME , C.ID AS C_ID , P.HEADCOUNT AS HEADCOUNT , P.HOURLY_WAGE AS HOURLY_WAGE FROM POSTING_OFF_RESPONSE POR, POSTING_OFFER PO, POSTING_OFF_STATUS POS , POSTING P, LOCATION L, POSTER_COMPANY_INFO PCI, COMPANY C WHERE POR.OFFER_ID = PO.ID AND POR.STATUS_ID = POS.ID AND PO.POSTING_ID = P.ID AND C.LOCATION_ID = L.ID AND P.P_COMPANY_INFO_ID = PCI.ID AND PCI.C_ID = C.ID AND POR.S_ID = #{s_id}
